localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Global Central Bank Update:
-Brazil hikes rates for the first time since 2015, 75 bps increase to 2.75%.
-Turkey hikes rates for the 4th time since last September, 200 bps increase to 19.0%. https://t.co/LuSQqy1slo
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
全球央行最新消息。
-巴西2015年以来首次加息，加息75个基点至2.75%。
-土耳其自去年9月以来第4次加息，加息200个基点至19.0%。https://t.co/LuSQqy1slo。

全球央行最新消息。
-巴西2015年以來首次加息，加息75個基點至2.75%。
-土耳其自去年9月以來第4次加息，加息200個基點至19.0%。https://t.co/LuSQqy1slo。

next.excerpt: The simplest and most modern data-scraper as a service, as if postman was automated! Focus on developing data-dependant apps without worrying about the data gathering infrastructure. Made for aggregators, bots and data-driven applications.
next.title: Nozomi - Postman, but automated

localize.description: 最简单、最现代的数据搜刮器作为一种服务，仿佛邮递员是自动的! 专注于开发依赖数据的应用程序，而不用担心数据收集基础设施。为聚合器、机器人和数据驱动的应用而生。
最簡單、最現代的數據搜刮器作爲一種服務，彷彿郵遞員是自動的! 專注於開發依賴數據的應用程序，而不用擔心數據收集基礎設施。爲聚合器、機器人和數據驅動的應用而生。
